titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1106) to prevent mortgage foreclosures and enhance mortgage credit availability.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1106) to prevent mortgage foreclosures and enhance mortgage credit availability.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-21, by Mr. Hastings (FL).
The resolution waives all points of order against the bill except those arising under clause 9 of rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 13.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 190.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 238 - 183 (Roll no. 88).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 198 (Roll no. 89).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1106) to prevent mortgage foreclosures and enhance mortgage credit availability.
